title: It's good
body: I'm using it since I got them and after sometime of using the pen its ink gets dark. It is smooth because it's a fibertip.

title: 'Packing needs to be improved'
body: 'Pen is fine but should be packed inside the proper boxes like other products. It was delivered by wrapping a brown papers that causes the damage to pen’s pack during transit.'

title: 'Price manipulation by Amazon and product ink comes out all time'
body: 'Price manipulation by Amazon and product ink'

title: 'Simple Elegance'
body: I picked up this pen recently, and it's a pleasant surprise. It's a nice, straightforward pen that gets the job done. It writes smoothly and feels comfortable in hand. Sometimes, simplicity is exactly what you need!

title: 'Ink flow when I write any paper.'
'Writing'
column5: the nib becomes inserted into the pen
column6: making it impossible for me to write.'

title: 'Missing pens'
body: I've not even opened the package yet can see there's pens missing inside the box.

title: 'Missing a pen'
body: 'I ordered this for regular ball point pen usage
column5: but this pen is like a sketch pen
column6: very awkward to use for prolonged periods of time'

title: 'Leakage'
body: 'Worst product by Reynolds. Ink leakage on all pens and experience is horrible'

title: 'Nor worth'
body: 'Very low quality for its price. You can get a much better pen for less than this price.'

title: 'Good enough.'
body: 'Good enough. I got it only for 70 for 6 pen. But its original value is 299'
